title: Hextech Chest dropping Champion Shards?!
body:
Hello,

I'm not sure if I can speak for everyone, but a majority of my opened Hextech chests have been champion shards.
This REALLY seems like a wasted chest, as we get champion shards from every time we level up now.

I would really like the opportunity to get more skins through hextech, and I feel like this redundant champion shard receipt is unnecessary.

Could we put an end to the champion shards in the Hextech chests?

Thank you for any thoughts on this.

~SG
